casebody.data:
Brian A. LEMPER, D.O.; Brian A. Lemper, D.O., Ltd.; the Center for Surgical Intervention, LLC; and American Regenerative Technologies, LLC, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT OF THE STATE OF NEVADA, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Mark R. Denton, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Ideal Business Partners, Inc., Real Party in Interest. No. 75916 Supreme Court of Nevada. JULY 20, 2018

DENIED.
